recipesJson.name: Strawberry Kiwi
recipesJson.author: jMrL
recipesJson.description: A great blast of strawberry with a end taste of great kiwi! I have been adding some cream notes to even have a better throaty after taste. # uPdates Jun 30 I am working with the percents on the bavarian and the ratio with the two strawberries.

reviews.text: thank you for the inspiration. bavarian cream, genius
